Ubuntu has held a <nowiki>[[UbuntuGlobalJam|Global Jam]]</nowiki> for the last few releases, and have scheduled one for the weekend of 26th to 28th March. We've participated in all of the previous ones, so we should do so this release cycle also! We discussed at <nowiki>[[CaliforniaTeam-Meetings-10March07|our March 7th meeting]]</nowiki> and decided to plan some events on the mailing list.

=== Locations ===

We're still in the early stages of planning right now, so check back later for more definite information! If you're not already subscribed, you might consider <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-ca|joining our mailing list]]</nowiki> to keep track of (and help out with!) planning progress.
